name: Darakhul Spy
description: The Darakhul Spy is a Medium undead featuring a cunning and stealthy appearance, often cloaked in shadow.
memorable: Its unique combination of stealth, deception, and combat versatility makes the Darakhul Spy particularly dangerous.
goals: Typically seeks to manipulate situations, gather information, or ambush unsuspecting targets.
relations: May be found allied with other undead or creatures of darkness, including ghouls and similar beings.
environment: Often encountered in dark, urban environments or areas where stealth and deception thrive.
strengths: Immunity to poison, resistance to necrotic damage, and strong stealth capabilities bolster its effectiveness.
weaknesses: Sunlight sensitivity reduces its combat effectiveness and hampers its perception.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack, delivering a Bite, Claw, and Shortsword strike with notable damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Stench ability poisons nearby enemies, disrupting their tactics and potentially incapacitating them.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dimly lit conditions effectively.
skills: Excels in Deception and Stealth, making it particularly effective at avoiding detection and manipulating situations.
additional_information: Evasion allows it to avoid damage from dexterity-saving effects.
The Master of Disguise ability enhances deception checks when camouflaged as a living creature.
Sneak Attack provides additional damage when attacking from a position of advantage.
Turning Defiance grants it advantage on saves against turning effects.
Contracting darakhul fever can inflict serious harm on humanoid enemies.
test_queries: undead spy skilled in deception and ambush
manipulative creature found in urban settings
